constituent: bullet, bow, simple, owl, rice field, brains, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: Hunting with a bow is too complicated. I´m switching to something simpler--using a bullet.
koohiiStory2: The bow was a weapon for simple times, but nowadays it has been replaced by bullets.
kunYomi: ひ.く、-ひ.き、はず.む、たま、はじ.く、はじ.ける、ただ.す、はじ.きゆみ
readingExamples: 弾 (たま), 弾む (はず.む), 弾く (ひ.く)
words:
弾力(だんりょく): elasticity, flexibility
爆弾(ばくだん): bomb
弾く(はじく): to flip, to snap
弾む(はずむ): to spring, to bound, to bounce, to be stimulated, to be encouraged, to get lively, to treat oneself to, to splurge on
弾(たま): bullet, shot, shell
弾く(ひく): play (piano, guitar)
